data.author: Han Suyin
data.quote: There is nothing stronger in the world than gentleness.

data.author: Aristophanes
data.quote: Let each man exercise the art he knows.

data.author: Joel Osteen
data.quote: Prospering just doesn't have to do with money.

data.author: Pablo Picasso
data.quote: Success is dangerous. One begins to copy oneself, and to copy oneself is more dangerous than to copy others. It leads to sterility.

data.author: Mother Teresa
data.quote: Love is a fruit in season at all times, and within reach of every hand.

data.author: Anita Roddick
data.quote: There is no scientific answer for success. You can't define it. You've simply got to live it and do it.

data.author: John Locke
data.quote: As people are walking all the time, in the same spot, a path appears.

data.author: Michael D. Higgins
data.quote: I hope that at the end of the seven years, people will say that I have been of some inspirational value to them at home in terms of inclusiveness and abroad, I look forward to representing Ireland.

data.author: Jim Rohn
data.quote: Success is nothing more than a few simple disciplines, practiced every day.

data.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam
data.quote: I firmly believe that unless one has tasted the bitter pill of failure, one cannot aspire enough for success.

data.author: Graham Greene
data.quote: Success is more dangerous than failure, the ripples break over a wider coastline.

data.author: Snoop Dogg
data.quote: To me, the Seventies were very inspirational and very influential... With my whole persona as Snoop Dogg, as a person, as a rapper. I just love the Seventies style, the way all the players dressed nice, you know, kept their hair looking good, drove sharp cars and they talked real slick.

data.author: Alan Shepard
data.quote: I think all of us certainly believed the statistics which said that probably 88% chance of mission success and maybe 96% chance of survival. And we were willing to take those odds.

data.author: Rose George
data.quote: What they have done in Japan, which I find so inspirational, is they've brought the toilet out from behind the locked door. They've made it conversational. People go out and upgrade their toilet. They talk about it. They've sanitized it.

data.author: William Blake
data.quote: If the doors of perception were cleansed everything would appear to man as it is, infinite.

data.author: Sammy Davis, Jr.
data.quote: Real success is not on the stage, but off the stage as a human being, and how you get along with your fellow man.

data.author: Anne Frank
data.quote: Everyone has inside of him a piece of good news. The good news is that you don't know how great you can be! How much you can love! What you can accomplish! And what your potential is!

data.author: Josh McDaniels
data.quote: Of all the things people have taught me regarding life lessons or anything that would benefit me, I don't think anything helped me learn more about life than football. You go through so many different things: adversity, how to handle adversity, how to handle success, how to lead, how to be a teammate, how to communicate.

data.author: Paloma Picasso
data.quote: I think, aesthetically, car design is so interesting - the dashboards, the steering wheels, and the beauty of the mechanics. I don't know how any of it works, I don't want to know, but it's inspirational.

data.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.
data.quote: The first question which the priest and the Levite asked was: 'If I stop to help this man, what will happen to me?' But... the good Samaritan reversed the question: 'If I do not stop to help this man, what will happen to him?'

data.author: Gertrude Himmelfarb
data.quote: Nothing is as seductive as the assurance of success.

data.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
data.quote: A great social success is a pretty girl who plays her cards as carefully as if she were plain.

data.author: Howie Mandel
data.quote: The success of any stand-up act comes out of life experience.

data.author: Wallis Simpson
data.quote: For a gallant spirit there can never be defeat.

data.author: Pierre-Joseph Proudhon
data.quote: When deeds speak, words are nothing.
